prompt: Minimalist logo: side profile silhouette of human head in solid green (#4ade80) with circuit board trace patterns extending from the back of the head like neural connections. The head wears a construction hard hat in bright safety orange (#f97316). Black background (#1a1a1a). Clean vector style, no gradients on the face. Circuit traces have nodes/dots at endpoints. Profile facing right. Tech company logo aesthetic, no text.
